introduction.introPart4: web development, I especially focus on

whoami.section1: I graduated from a private high school in Prosek with a specialization in computer networks, which provided me with a solid foundation in information technology. Later, I continued my studies at Charles University, where I again focused on information technology. During my studies at both schools, I had the opportunity to work with various web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, and PHP.
whoami.section2: During my university studies, I gained valuable practical experience working at CommerzBank. Starting as a Student Support, I successfully communicated with clients and fulfilled their requests. Later, I had the opportunity to work as a Junior Developer, where I became familiar with other modern technologies, including React, React Query/Router, Framer Motion, Git, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI.
whoami.section3: My main interest and motivation are continuous learning and improvement in software development and web technologies. I am enthusiastic about new challenges and opportunities that this field offers me, and I would like to continue educating myself and developing my skills. With passion and determination, I will engage in further projects and opportunities that will bring me the opportunity for further growth and professional development.
